hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah cursed women who visit graves, and those who take them as Masjid and put lamps on them

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِي اتِّخَاذِ السُّرُجِ عَلَى الْقُبُورِ
chapter.eng-name: The Stern Warning Against Putting Lamp On Graves
